events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and their resume looks promising with strong development skills.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering because it clearly mentions software development and coding expertise.
Assigned the recruiter responsible for the engineering team to oversee the interview process and coordinate technical evaluations.
The initial phone screening was conducted, where the candidate demonstrated clear understanding of key software engineering concepts and development practices.
Scheduled a technical interview with the senior engineering team for the candidate to assess their hands-on coding and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with strong algorithmic thinking and software design knowledge.
The next step is to schedule an HR interview to discuss the candidate's cultural fit and employment terms within the engineering department.
HR interview was completed successfully with positive feedback regarding the candidate's communication skills and team collaboration mindset.
An offer letter has been proposed to the candidate outlining the role, salary, and benefits for the software engineer position.
The candidate responded positively to the offer, expressing excitement about joining our engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and is ready to start their role as a software engineer in the coming weeks.
The onboarding process has started smoothly with the candidate completing necessary trainings and setting up development tools.
The recruitment case is closed successfully with the new software engineer fully integrated into the engineering team and contributing effectively.
